lead_paragraph: Belgium's Tom Goegebuer, the oldest weightlifter at the Olympics since 1988, is looking forward to retirement and, most of all, a cold beer after coming 14th in the men’s 56kg at the Rio Games.

headline.print_headline: Weightlifting-Veteran Belgian Lifter Slams Cheats and Calls Time
headline.main: Weightlifting-Veteran Belgian Lifter Slams Cheats and Calls Time
